sentences.english: It is in our nature to judge the people around us.
sentences.chinese: 對身邊人品頭論足，是我們的天性使然。

sentences.english: When people ask you how you are, tell them and then ask them how they are.
sentences.chinese: 不要對別人品頭論足，當然稱讚他人的外表是必要的。
